text: Joseph Zong Huaide (; 5 March 1920 â€“ 5 January 2021) was a Chinese Roman Catholic prelate. He was the Roman Catholic Bishop of Roman Catholic Diocese of Shaanxi, China from 1987 to 2003. He was born in Sanyuan County, China. Zong died in Sanyuan in January 2021 at the age of 100.GCatholic.org.-Diocese of Sanyuan ==References== Category:1920 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Chinese centenarians Category:Chinese Roman Catholic bishops Category:20th-century Chinese people Category:21st-century Chinese people
